LanguageData.ESShieldTip: This universal shield series has been modified to allow the wearer to perform ranged attacks while the shield is active.
LanguageData.ShieldNet_ContainedShieldNetComps: Shield Network: {0} shields, {1} server units, {2} terminals, {3} disabled
LanguageData.ShieldNet_Command_InterceptIn_Desc: Intercept projectiles fired from outside to inside the shield
LanguageData.ShieldNet_Command_AllowOut_Desc: Do not intercept projectiles fired from inside to outside the shield
LanguageData.ShieldNet_Command_InterceptOverhead_Desc: Intercept hostile arcing projectiles, such as mortar shells
LanguageData.ShieldNet_Command_InterceptGround_Desc: Intercept hostile direct-fire projectiles, such as bullets
LanguageData.ShieldNet_Command_ResetAllocatedResouces: Release all allocated shield network resources in this server unit
Release all allocated shield network resources in the current network
No shield network resources allocated in this module
No shield network resources allocated in current network
LanguageData.ShieldNet_Command_AllocateResouces_Desc: Open resource allocation panel for the shield network controlled by this terminal
LanguageData.ShieldNet_Option_ResourceToMinRadius_Too: Controls minimum shield radius provided per shield network resource point
LanguageData.ShieldNet_Option_ResourceToMaxRadius_Too: Controls maximum shield radius provided per shield network resource point
LanguageData.ShieldNet_Option_ResourceToRechargeSecon: Controls reduced shield recharge time (seconds) per shield network resource point
LanguageData.ShieldNet_Option_ResourceToRechargeRate_: Controls shield recharge rate percentage per resource point. When recharge completes, shield gains maximum energy corresponding to this percentage
LanguageData.ShieldNet_Option_ResourceToMaxEnergy_Too: Controls maximum shield energy capacity provided per shield network resource point
LanguageData.ShieldNet_Option_ResourceToChargeSpeed_T: Controls shield charge speed provided per shield network resource point
LanguageData.ShieldNet_Option_SlowChargeFactor_Toolti: Controls slow recharge speed when shield is inactive. Shield generators not connected to a terminal network will charge slowly
LanguageData.ShieldNet_Option_DisarmedByEmpForSeconds: Duration shield generator remains disabled after directly receiving EMP damage
LanguageData.ShieldNet_Option_UseKineticEnergy_Label: Loss energy calculated by kinetic energy.
LanguageData.ShieldNet_Option_UseKineticEnergy_Toolti: High speed projectiles may cause huge energy loss when enabled.
LanguageData.ShieldNet_Option_KineticEnergyFactor_Too: Scaling factor for kinetic energy calculation when intercepting projectiles (required due to quadratic kinetic formula)
LanguageData.ShieldNet_Option_MortarKineticEnergyFact: Scaling factor for kinetic energy calculation when intercepting arcing projectiles (overrides kinetic absorption factor for arcing projectiles)
LanguageData.ShieldNet_Option_RenderAlphaFactor_Toolt: Controls overall opacity of shield visual effects. Higher values mean more opaque
LanguageData.Shield_Option_ShieldEnergyLossFactor_Too: Multiplier for all damage, calculated before all other factors
LanguageData.Shield_Option_ShieldEmpDmgFactor_Tooltip: Multiplier for EMP damage against shields
LanguageData.Shield_Option_ShieldMeleeDmgFactor_Toolt: Multiplier for melee damage against shields
LanguageData.Shield_Option_ShieldEnviromentalDmgFacto: Percentage of environmental damage applied to shields
LanguageData.Shield_Option_ShieldBloodTransferFactor_: Controls efficiency of energy transfer between shield and blood energy
LanguageData.RegenQuickTip: Warning: Fast regeneration may cause additional blood loss.
LanguageData.CanRegenQuickTip: Fast regeneration disabled due to severe blood loss.
LanguageData.LimbsRegen_Option_LimbsRegenSecondsPerHe: Base time (seconds) required to regenerate 1 health point
LanguageData.LimbsRegen_Option_QuickRegenFactor_Toolt: Speed multiplier for fast regeneration compared to normal regeneration
LanguageData.LimbsRegen_Option_QuickRegenBloodLossPer: Blood loss percentage caused per health point regenerated in fast mode
LanguageData.LimbsRegen_Option_QuickRegenBloodLossMax: Maximum blood loss severity that can be caused by fast regeneration\n\nWarning: Values close to 1 may cause death from blood loss
LanguageData.StableMindset_Option_CorrectFactor_Toolt: Multiplier for correction strength when mood deviates from baseline
LanguageData.StableMindset_Option_BaseLineNeed_Toolti: Target baseline value that mood will naturally adjust toward
